gtest.assertion: If the jsp_precompile request parameter has no value, the request will not be delivered to the target JSP page. JavaServer Pages Specification v1.2, Sec. 8.4.2
gtest.testStrategy: Validate that no response body is returned when jsp_precompile has no value.

gtest.assertion: If the jsp_precompile request parameter is set to false, the request will not be delivered to the target JSP page. JavaServer Pages Specification v1.2, Sec. 8.4.2
gtest.testStrategy: Validate that no response body is returned when jsp_precompile is set to false.

gtest.assertion: If the jsp_precompile request parameter is set to true, the request will not be delivered to the target JSP page. JavaServer Pages Specification v1.2, Sec. 8.4.2
gtest.testStrategy: Validate that no response body is returned when jsp_precompile is set to true.

gtest.assertion: Valid parameter values for jsp_precompile are 'true', 'false', and no value. Any other value will result in an HTTP Error; 500 (Server Error). JavaServer Pages specification v1.2, Sec. 8.4.2
gtest.testStrategy: Set the jsp_precompile request paramter to a non valid value and validate that a 500 error occurs.

gtest.assertion: Test that the proper tld file is located when the URI in tha taglib directive is an absolutr URI
gtest.testStrategy: Use an absolute URI and print a message from the tag handler telling the type of URI that was used.No error should ocurr

gtest.assertion: Test that the proper tld file is located when the URI in tha taglib directive is a relative URI
gtest.testStrategy: Use a relative URI and print a message from the tag handler telling the type of URI that was used.No error should ocurr

gtest.assertion: Test that the proper tld file is located when the URI in tha taglib directive is a non relative URI
gtest.testStrategy: Use a non relative URI and print a message from the tag handler telling the type of URI that was used.No error should ocurr

gtest.assertion: Test that the proper tld file is located when the URI in tha taglib directive points to a jar file
gtest.testStrategy: Use a jar file in URI and print a message from the tag handler telling the type of URI that was used.No error should ocurr

gtest.assertion: Test if string Hello can be displayed
gtest.testStrategy: Simple html display when no JSP tags are present
